sensors.title: Select sensors
sensors.description:
Select sensors for power consumption and spot price.

**Spot price sensor:** Use Nord Pool 'Current price' sensor, e.g. `sensor.nord_pool_no5_current_price`

pricing.title: Custom pricing
pricing.description:
Energy tariff (energiledd) is a per-kWh fee from your grid company, varying by time of day.

Find prices at your grid company's website. Leave at 0 to use default rates.

init.title: Strømkalkulator settings
init.description:
Configure sensors and grid pricing.

**Energy tariff:** Per-kWh fee from grid company. Leave at 0 for defaults.
